title: Shipment: Process Shipment Tracking Events for CRM-T orders
description:
Description
POT consumers shall be able to get notified when a shipment status changes. To achieve this POT shall process events provided by the CRM-T shipment tracking service and
acceptance_criteria: POT processes shipment create events of the CRM-T shipment tracking service
POT processes shipment update events of the CRM-T shipment tracking service
